metadata.title: CVE-2020-11729 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in DAViCal Andrew's Web Libraries (AWL) through0.60. Long-term session cookies, uses to provide long-term sessioncontinuity, are not generated securely, enabling a brute-force attack thatmay be successful.

criterions.comment: awl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
